sentences.sContent: The young woman was so sedulous that she received a commendation for her hard work.
sentences.sContent_eng: The young woman was so sedulous that she received a commendation for her hard work.
sentences.sCn: 年轻女性是如此孜孜不倦，她收到了表扬她的辛勤工作。

synos.tran: 聚精会神的；勤勉的；勤苦工作的

remMethod.val: sed (坐) + ulous (多…的) → 坐得多说明学的多 → 勤勉的

trans.tranOther: constant or persistent in use or attention; assiduous; diligent
